title: 11/16: Start or Sit (NFC); Packers Should Have Gone for it (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
What was Mike McCarthy thinking!? We start the show with our thoughts on the weak decision to punt in the fourth quarter and then our Fantasy takeaways from GB-SEA. Which QB do we like better rest of season? Why do we think Marquez Valdes-Scantling actually has better times ahead? ... News and notes (10:30) including a Joe Mixon update, a WR with an amazing upcoming schedule (16:00), a bet involving Dak Prescott is made (16:50), Startometer (20:24) and Beat the Waiver Wire (22:55) ... HOU-WAS (26:08), CAR-DET (32:00), DAL-ATL (38:40), TB-NYG (45:25), PHI-NO (53:30), OAK-ARI (57:13) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Our thoughts on Mike McCarthy's weak decision and then who to start and who to sit in the NFC home games. How are we feeling about Dak Prescott, Mark Ingram, Ryan Fitzpatrick and many more?
